knimeNode.name: Extract Duration/Period Fields
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts period or duration fields from period or duration cells.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts the selected fields from a duration or period column and appends the values as integer or long columns. Valid fields are hour, minute, second and nanosecond for a duration and year, month and day for a period. There are two modes: either breaks down the duration into its individuals by selecting several fields, or get the whole duration/period in a single number by selecting only a single field.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: A Duration or Period column can be chosen.

tab.name: Field Selection
tab.option: A granularity can be selected to which the actual period or duration gets converted. The extracted value is truncated, e.g. from a duration holding 2 hours, 30 minutes and 15 seconds the node extracts either two hours, 150 minutes or 9015 seconds. The extracted value will be appended as a new column.

Several fields can be selected to extract. The duration or period gets broken down in its individual parts, e.g. from a duration holding two hours, 30 minutes, and 15 seconds the node extracts (depending on the selection) three new columns containing two hours, 30 minutes, and 15 seconds, respectively.

ports.outPort: Output table containing the extracted fields as appended columns.
